name: Dancing PixelMan
description:
Welcome to Dancing PixelMan, a game where you are a cool guy who will show everyone who is the best dancer in the world.

Use WASD keys to do different dance steps.

Each time you get two right, things  will go a little bit faster.

If you miss, the score will go down to 0 and the speed will reset.

Enjoy the dance!

By: @jorge_jxe
